text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response explicitly discusses the parody exception in Italy (Art. 70 of Law 633/1941) and correctly states the condition for its application: 'provided it is a genuine parody, does not conflict with the normal exploitation of the work, and does not cause unjustified prejudice to the author.'
